main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in Houston, Texas in January 1958, including observations of descending star-like objects and other unidentified flying phenomena.
interesting points: One sighting involved a brilliant light descending near the horizon and pulsating before disappearing., Witnesses described seeing objects with no visible means of propulsion, flying silently and at high speeds., The objects reported were oval-shaped, with one described as being about 30 to 40 feet in diameter., Residents speculated that the objects could be connected to military activities at nearby Ellington Air Force Base., There were at least three separate incidents, with some witnesses claiming to see the objects over several days.
sighted object: various unidentified flying objects including starlike objects and bright lights
witness description: Residents including families and amateur astronomers observed the phenomena over several evenings.
